Staff, very rare (requires attunement by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard)
This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. When you hit an object or structure with a melee attack using the staff, you deal double damage (triple damage on a critical hit).
The staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC: @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.46QP4gtGhM6YXqQN]{thunderwave} (1 charge), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.QBDBcidEpF1xgxYs]{shatter} (2 charges), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.Kb8LCYbhMdMzv7f5]{circle of death} (6 charges), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.gRODtP9C3Vkq7CFJ]{disintegrate} (6 charges), or @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.tBmWXvs9kbMxZrzc]{earthquake} (8 charges).
The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the staff crumbles to dust and is destroyed.
